https://www.swiftstack.com/docs/install/configure_networking.html

find the wifi `nic` with `ifconfig` eg. `wlp3s0`

Update the static ip in `/etc/network/interfaces` with similar config as below

```
# This file describes the network interfaces available on your system
# and how to activate them. For more information, see interfaces(5).

# The loopback network interface
auto lo
iface lo inet loopback

# The primary network interface
auto wlp3s0
iface wlp3s0 inet static
    address 192.168.2.x
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    network 192.168.0.0
    broadcast 192.168.0.255
    gateway 192.168.2.1
    dns-nameservers 8.8.4.4 8.8.8.8
```


Since this is a wifi `nic`, run wpa_cli to set wifi defaults
